title: Options panel settings should be auto-saved
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
Downloaded mRemoteNG v1.78.2 NB 3224 I have looked at the File | Options design again, because it just feels not the best UI/UX. This is maybe continuation of [issue 2909](https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/2909) where we discussed what should happen when Option panel is closed down. That issue looked like a bug, but this issue is more about enhancement.

Lets step back a little bit. How did File | Options work few NB releases ago? Options were opened as dialog and in dialog it is cus...
